data.persona: I love living in the mud. I eat just about anything. I am intelligent.
data.description:
You are in the the spring bath.
The spring bath is a deep, natural pool of crisp and clear spring water. It is surrounded by rose bushes on all sides except a northern and southern opening, which lead out of the enclosure of roses.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the priest so that I can say thanks for the priest taking care of me.
data.mid_motivation: I will be bathing in the spring bath after rolling in the mud all day long.
data.long_motivation: I will continue to live my indolent life, rolling in the mud, eating food and growing fat while being cared for.
